name: *BEEP*
description:
This is a game made during Global Game Jam 2020 (the theme was: "Repair")

You are alone on a strange space station, that started to fall apart.

Check the maps visible on wall-mounted screens for catastrophy types. Find proper tool and repair the ship.

Watch the hull strength and try to survive for 240 seconds!

Some of the 3D assets, level design and music: Marcin Białkowski

Playtime: 4 minutes
